exam.question: It is no ______ that a large number of violent crimes are com-mitted under the influence of alcohol.

answer.explain: It is no coincidence...为固定搭配： …并非巧合。句意： 大量的暴力犯罪都是在酒精的作用下发生的， 这一点并非巧合。correspondence： 对应； inspiration： 灵感； intuition： 直觉。

sentences.sContent: ‘I’m going to Appleby tomorrow.’ ‘ What a coincidence ! I’m going there too.’
sentences.sCn: “明天我要去阿普尔比。”“太巧了！我也要去那里。”

sentences.sContent: ...It's no coincidence that kids start deserting science once it becomes formalised...

words.tran: 一致的；符合的；同时发生的
巧合的；符合的；暗合的；一致的

trans.tranCn: 巧合， 巧事； 一致， 符合
trans.tranOther: when two things happen at the same time, in the same place, or to the same people in a way that seems surprising or unusual
